alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 25 at 12:35PM MDT until September 25 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS AND LOW RH EXPECTED THROUGH THIS EVENING... .Strong and gusty winds will combine with low relative humidities this afternoon and evening. Conditions will be worse in the southern half of Vale and Burns BLM districts mainly along the Nevada border region. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT /7 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...BURNS BLM AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...636 AND 637... * WINDS...Sustained winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts 30 to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 17%.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
